subject: Football (College)
Sickle Cell Anemia
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The family of the former University of California football player Ted Agu filed a wrongful-death lawsuit against the school’s regents for “reckless and negligent behavior” by the staff toward an athlete known to have sickle-cell traits.
snippet: The family of the former University of California football player Ted Agu filed a wrongful-death lawsuit against the school’s regents for “reckless and negligent behavior” by the staff toward an athlete known to have sickle-cell traits.
